node.title: Why Use MEAN Stack for Web & Mobile App Development Project?
node.content:
Contents

  • What is the MEAN stack?
  • Analyzing aspects of MEAN stack
    • MongoDB
    • Express.js
    • Angular.js
    • Node.js
  • How does MEAN stack architecture work?
  • When to prefer MEAN stack?
  • 20 reasons to use MEAN stack for web & mobile app development project
  • Applications crafted with MEAN stack
  • Comparison between MEAN stack and Full stack
  • Key takeaways

Today in this digital era developing a web application requires a reliable and dependable software stack. Modern-day developers are utilizing a blend of advanced technologies to get swifter and enhanced outcomes through their projects.

Increasing the use of MEAN Stack technology is one of the primary examples of this scenario. MEAN JS is utilized to craft robust and scalable web applications. Let’s explore what exactly is MEAN Stack framework is and how the MEAN stack works for your business.

What is the MEAN stack?

MEAN stack is the compilation and synergy of technologies applied to build web applications. MEAN stack programming is used by several Web App Development Companies, and it precisely stands for “MongoDB Express.js AngularJS Node.js.”

MEAN is an application entirely written on JavaScript technologies. You can effortlessly write inclusive test suites for your MEAN application with the latest MEAN stack testing frameworks, including MochaJS KarmaJS and JasmineJS.

With MEAN Stack programming, you can deal with your products using explicit attributes. Furthermore, without distressing about migrations, you can revolutionize and adjust the data layers.

So, the MEAN Stack structure has offered the development community an advanced way of web development that can efficiently operate on each tier of your application.

Analyzing aspects of MEAN stack development

1. MongoDB

It is a highly used and conventional database management system that provides the NoSQL type database. MongoDB is a pioneer in bringing the assortment and documentation of the data. It is applied in technology projects for data storage and retrieval.

MongoDB makes it more straightforward to pass data between server and client. It stores the essential data sets in binary JSON format. Furthermore, it offers better accessibility, higher performance, and scalability as it is a cross-platform database.

To accept JSON-like documents, MongoDB turns away from the relational database’s table-based structure. It also makes data integration quicker and simpler for MEAN stack development company.

2. Express.js

It is applied synchronously with Node.js for the MEAN stack to manage the server-side JS response. ExpressJS assists web developers in safeguarding and executing applications swifter. If you are aspiring for quickly loading applications, Express is the ideal preference for your project.

Express offers functionalities for both single-page and multi-page web applications. It is stirred by the highly accepted Ruby framework, Sinatra. Express caters to both web and mobile applications.

It enables developers to create software using JavaScript directly on the server-side. And also facilitate JavaScript’s newfound back-end functions across projects.

3. Angular.js

Angular.js is a popular JS technology and precise front-end framework for application development projects. It is utilized by developers to craft brisk apps with modest maintenance.

It is a preferred client-side framework and also enables user request processing. You can easily apply MEAN stack Angular 4 for an engaging and seamless UI.

Angular.js also assists in getting rid of surplus code and easing complex technology stuff. It offers advanced functionalities such as two-way data binding. And it even works as a structural framework when applied for dynamic web applications.

4. Node.js

It works effectively with Express to deliver enhanced system responses to cater the diverse user requests. Node.js is applied and works as the spine of the framework in the MEAN stack project structure. The well-accepted server-side JavaScript runtime environment supports the MEAN stack project effectively.

The Node.js framework is entirely based on Google Chrome’s V8 engine. It is resourceful and lightweight as it utilizes a precise event-driven and on-blocking I/O model.

It is open source and has the most extensive ecosystem of open source libraries called npm. It can efficiently run JavaScript applications outside of the browser and offers a cross-platform runtime environment.

How does MEAN stack architecture work?

MEAN Stack Architecture

The MEAN Stack Architecture works in five stages.

Stage 1: Angular as a client-side language is the foremost one to work on the client request.

Stage 2: The client request then goes into NodeJS being the JavaScript server-side language.

Stage 3: ExpressJS is then into the process and makes a database request.

Stage 4: Then MongoDB retrieves the data and sends the response to ExpressJS.

Stage 5: NodeJS returns the data to the AngularJS to showcase the outcomes, and in return, the data is taken back from the ExpressJS.

When to prefer MEAN stack?

MEAN.js assists with app development, testing, and deployment. The MEAN stack web development is preferred for building diverse applications, dynamic SPAs, social media apps, and multifaceted technology projects.

It can be further applied across web applications for Big Data, Streaming, real-time app projects, enterprise, and secondary business apps.

The use of the MEAN stack technology stack relies on the level of JS base across the involved developers, project size, and scalability.

20 reasons to use MEAN stack for web & mobile app development project

1) Free & open-source stack

As we discussed, the MEAN stack comprises Express, Angular, MongoDB, and Node.js, which are all free & open-source stacks. The stack reduces the development costs. Additionally, their communities offer ready-to-use boilerplate codes that can facilitate the development of incredible UIs.

2) Based on javascript

The complete MEAN web development works and is applied to the JavaScript language. The backing for MVC architecture tells the whole story of how JS is the foundation for MEAN.js.

3) Trouble-free to implement

With JavaScript being the foundation, the implementation of the MEAN stack turns simple. Developers can utilize the JS platform to implement the MEAN stack application effortlessly.

4) Extensive skill base to have

With Angular, Node.js, and Express, you get the most superior technology professionals. A MEAN stack developer has expertise in multi-tasking across diverse technologies.

A developer with the know-how of the MEAN stack possesses specialization in both front-end and back-end technologies. The skills across DBMS such as MongoDB are the added advantages.

5) Delivers high-performance levels

MEAN stack has high-performing JavaScript technologies that can help build innovative web applications. It offers web applications with native containers that further deliver platform-oriented experiences and enhance performance levels.

6) Effective prototyping abilities

Any business desires to prototype to test the functionalities and user requests. In this scenario, most companies go for MVP.

Minimum Viable Product (MVP) is a helpful and cost-effective approach for prototyping. It assists businesses in estimating the user-friendly nature of their application ideas and concepts. MEAN stack technologies lend a hand to enable enterprises with the MVP processes.

Read more: What are Noteworthy MVP Business Examples and their Benefits?

7) Involve lower costs

Any business desires to remain cut-throat. So, they require app development that involves lower costs. MEAN JS can assist them in being open-source and free. A team of professional developers can enable MEAN stack development and trim down your project costs.

8) Boosts developer competence

MEAN programming stack can be of great assistance for organizations to boost their developer competencies. It is easy for organizations to accept modernized approaches through the MEAN stack, which helps build developer skill-sets to write modern web apps with the MEAN stack. You can even apply new and innovative techniques such as agile with MEAN JS.

9) Common language for the architecture

There are various benefits of a common language for the intact app architecture. Across the MEAN stack, JavaScript is the solitary and common language. So, you can seamlessly manage the database, front-end, and back-end together without much complexity.

10) The suppleness of the technology stack

MEAN JS is supple to manage project development, testing, and deployment. It is quite flexible in use and can further assist you in handling user-generated data.

11) Turns code-sharing undemanding and beneficial

When developers attempt to transfer code between diverse frameworks, the code-sharing process should be companionable. Isomorphic coding across the MEAN stack turns this code-sharing functionality undemanding and highly beneficial.

12) User-friendly, reusable & cloud-friendly

MEAN stack facilitates the formation of UIs that offer a user-friendly experience. It backs the MVC (Model-View-Controller) architecture. So, you can generate native-type web applications.

MEAN stack applies Node.js by using the non-blocking type I/O and shuns the overload of the request processing to enable superior speeds. On the other hand, Angular facilitates code reusability.

The technology stack utilizes open-source frameworks using cloud repositories. Even MongoDB assists while dealing with cloud usage.

13) Straightforward data transfer

The JSON files are precisely a data exchange format applied in Node.js and Angular. It makes and facilitates the data transfer across the system pretty effortlessly with the help of mean stack development services, you can have a straightforward data transfer experience.

14) Immense repositories

MEAN stack can facilitate you to control the diverse modules in Node.js. The development teams can find several Node modules from immense libraries.

15) Influential community

JavaScript has an influential community. It has developers enabling the frameworks. The trendiest instance across their community is the deprecation of Angular.js to the augment of Angular.

16) Real-time, interactive & engage users

Real-time apps can assist in engaging a diverse set of users. Node.js assists MEAN stack in attaining the interactive abilities of real-time applications. Many organizations such as Walmart, LinkedIn, and other big players utilize the Node.js MEAN stack.

17) Seamless project management

Companies using MEAN stack projects get efficient using JS base. As the dynamic teams speak one language, there is no perplexity for project managers.

18) Simple to shift code

Shifting the code between diverse frameworks is easier with MEAN.js. The Isomorphic codes are rapidly executable transversely through the JS frameworks involved in the MEAN stack.

19) Command of infinite modules

MEAN stack gets the control of infinite modules with the assistance of Node.js. The Node Package Manager (NPM) facilitates MEAN.js with unlimited modules from numerous Node libraries.

20) Don’t require LAMP

LAMP is a pretty popular technology term and stands for Linux, Apache, MySQL, and PHP. This technology stack is utilized for web applications. However, with MEAN.js, you don’t have to deal with or require the LAMP anymore, which makes things easier.

Applications crafted with MEAN stack

MEAN stack is valuable and more supportive for enterprise-grade apps. Some of the leading applications crafted on MEAN stack javascript include

  1. Facebook
  2. Youtube
  3. Instagram
  4. Forbes
  5. Flickr
  6. Netflix
  7. PayTM
  8. Tumblr

Comparison between MEAN stack and Full stack

There is a significant disparity between the MEAN stack and Full-stack development. Full-stack development comprises diverse front-end and back-end frameworks.

So, you have to decide between diverse programming languages like PHP, JavaScript, Python, Java, .Net, and others.

On the other hand, the MEAN stack exclusively relies on the JS programming languages. So, there is no involvement of other languages, which makes development to be well-organized and competent.

Read more: Full Stack Vs. MEAN Stack – How to Select the Precise Stack?

Key takeaways

MEAN stack technology is getting better day by day and is also uncomplicated to use. The JS base brings more than sufficient advantages to enable the MEAN software stack. It provides the technology stack control to build secure web applications and other business apps. Learn more about choosing the right technology stack for your project

Many have considered this control and applied MEAN stack development for their technology projects. So, don’t miss out on a technology stack that can assist you in getting swifter, more secure, and cost-efficient solutions for your business!

We at Techtic are both a MEAN stack and Full stack development company, which means our dedicated teams enable all your standard and dedicated project needs on web and app development. For MEAN stack development services, feel free to connect with us today!
